Berry.Name: Cheri Berry
Berry.Effect: Cures paralysis.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it can recover from paralysis on its own in battle.

Berry.Name: Chesto Berry
Berry.Effect: Cures sleep.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it can recover from sleep on its own in battle.

Berry.Name: Pecha Berry
Berry.Effect: Cures poison.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it can recover from poisoning on its own in battle.

Berry.Name: Rawst Berry
Berry.Effect: Cures burn.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it can recover from a burn on its own in battle.

Berry.Name: Aspear Berry
Berry.Effect: Cures freeze.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it can recover from being frozen on its own in battle.

Berry.Name: Leppa Berry
Berry.Effect: Restores 10 PP.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by a Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it can restore 10 PP to a depleted move during battle.

Berry.Name: Oran Berry
Berry.Effect: Restores 10 HP.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it can restore its own HP by 10 points during battle.

Berry.Name: Persim Berry
Berry.Effect: Cures confusion.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it can recover from confusion on its own in battle.

Berry.Name: Lum Berry
Berry.Effect: Cures any status condition and confusion.
Berry.Description: A berry to be consumed by a Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it can recover from any status condition during battle.

Berry.Name: Sitrus Berry
Berry.Effect: Restores 25% HP.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it can restore its own HP by a small amount during battle.

Berry.Name: Figy Berry
Berry.Effect: When HP falls below 25%, restores 50% HP, but confuses Pokémon that dislike spicy food.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, it restores the user's HP in a pinch, but it will cause confusion if the user hates the taste.

Berry.Name: Wiki Berry
Berry.Effect: When HP falls below 25%, restores 50% HP, but confuses Pokémon that dislike dry food.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, it restores the user's HP in a pinch, but it will cause confusion if the user hates the taste.

Berry.Name: Mago Berry
Berry.Effect: When HP falls below 25%, restores 50% HP, but confuses Pokémon that dislike sweet food.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, it restores the user's HP in a pinch, but it will cause confusion if the user hates the taste.

Berry.Name: Aguav Berry
Berry.Effect: When HP falls below 25%, restores 50% HP, but confuses Pokémon that dislike bitter food.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, it restores the user's HP in a pinch, but it will cause confusion if the user hates the taste.

Berry.Name: Iapapa Berry
Berry.Effect: When HP falls below 25%, restores 50% HP, but confuses Pokémon that dislike sour food.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, it restores the user's HP in a pinch, but it will cause confusion if the user hates the taste.

Berry.Name: Razz Berry
Berry.Effect: No effect.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be used in cooking. This Berry is very rare and hard to obtain in the Unova region.

Berry.Name: Bluk Berry
Berry.Effect: No effect.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be used in cooking. This Berry is very rare and hard to obtain in the Unova region.

Berry.Name: Pinap Berry
Berry.Effect: No effect.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be used in cooking. This Berry is very rare and hard to obtain in the Unova region.

Berry.Name: Pomeg Berry
Berry.Effect: Lowers HP EVs, raises friendship.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. Using it on a Pokémon makes it more friendly but lowers its base HP.

Berry.Name: Kelpsy Berry
Berry.Effect: Lowers Attack EVs, raises friendship.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. Using it on a Pokémon makes it more friendly but lowers its base Attack.

Berry.Name: Qualot Berry
Berry.Effect: Lowers Defense EVs, raises friendship.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. Using it on a Pokémon makes it more friendly but lowers its base Defense.

Berry.Name: Hondew Berry
Berry.Effect: Lowers Special Attack EVs, raises friendship.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. Using it on a Pokémon makes it more friendly but lowers its base Sp. Atk.

Berry.Name: Grepa Berry
Berry.Effect: Lowers Special Defense EVs, raises friendship.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. Using it on a Pokémon makes it more friendly but lowers its base Sp. Def.

Berry.Name: Tamato Berry
Berry.Effect: Lowers Speed EVs, raises friendship.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. Using it on a Pokémon makes it more friendly but lowers its base Speed.

Berry.Name: Cornn Berry
Berry.Effect: No effect.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be used in cooking. This Berry is very rare and hard to obtain in the Unova region.

Berry.Name: Belue Berry
Berry.Effect: No effect.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be used in cooking. This Berry is very rare and hard to obtain in the Unova region.

Berry.Name: Occa Berry
Berry.Effect: Decreases damage taken by the holder from a supereffective Fire-type move.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Fire-type attack.

Berry.Name: Passho Berry
Berry.Effect: Decreases damage taken by the holder from a supereffective Water-type move.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Water-type attack.

Berry.Name: Wacan Berry
Berry.Effect: Decreases damage taken by the holder from a supereffective Electric-type move.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, this berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Electric-type attack.

Berry.Name: Rindo Berry
Berry.Effect: Decreases damage taken by the holder from a supereffective Grass-type move.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Grass-type attack.

Berry.Name: Yache Berry
Berry.Effect: Decreases damage taken by the holder from a supereffective Ice-type move.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Ice-type attack.

Berry.Name: Chople Berry
Berry.Effect: Decreases damage taken by the holder from a supereffective Fighting-type move.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Fighting-type attack.

Berry.Name: Kebia Berry
Berry.Effect: Decreases damage taken by the holder from a supereffective Poison-type move.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Poison-type attack.

Berry.Name: Shuca Berry
Berry.Effect: Decreases damage taken by the holder from a supereffective Ground-type move.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Ground-type attack.

Berry.Name: Coba Berry
Berry.Effect: Decreases damage taken by the holder from a supereffective Flying-type move.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Flying-type attack.

Berry.Name: Payapa Berry
Berry.Effect: Decreases damage taken by the holder from a supereffective Psychic-type move.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Psychic-type attack.

Berry.Name: Tanga Berry
Berry.Effect: Decreases damage taken by the holder from a supereffective Bug-type move.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, this berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Bug-type attack.

Berry.Name: Charti Berry
Berry.Effect: Decreases damage taken by the holder from a supereffective Rock-type move.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Rock-type attack.

Berry.Name: Kasib Berry
Berry.Effect: Decreases damage taken by the holder from a supereffective Ghost-type move.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Ghost-type attack.

Berry.Name: Haban Berry
Berry.Effect: Decreases damage taken by the holder from a supereffective Dragon-type move.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Dragon-type attack.

Berry.Name: Colbur Berry
Berry.Effect: Decreases damage taken by the holder from a supereffective Dark-type move.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Dark-type attack.

Berry.Name: Babiri Berry
Berry.Effect: Decreases damage taken by the holder from a supereffective Steel-type move.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Steel-type attack.

Berry.Name: Chilan Berry
Berry.Effect: Decreases damage taken by the holder from a Normal-type move.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one Normal-type attack.

Berry.Name: Liechi Berry
Berry.Effect: Raises Attack when HP falls below 25%.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, its Attack stat will increase when it's in a pinch.

Berry.Name: Ganlol Berry
Berry.Effect: Raises Defense when HP falls below 25%.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, its Defense stat will increase when it's in a pinch.

Berry.Name: Salac Berry
Berry.Effect: Raises Speed when HP falls below 25%.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be held by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, its Speed stat will increase when it's in a pinch.

Berry.Name: Petaya Berry
Berry.Effect: Raises Special Attack when HP falls below 25%.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, its Sp. Atk stat will increase when it's in a pinch.

Berry.Name: Apicot Berry
Berry.Effect: Raises Special Defense when HP falls below 25%.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, its Sp. Def stat will increase when it's in a pinch.

Berry.Name: Lansat Berry
Berry.Effect: Raises critical hit ratio when HP falls below 25%.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, its critical-hit ratio will increase when it's in a pinch.

Berry.Name: Starf Berry
Berry.Effect: Sharply raises a random stat when HP falls below 25%.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, one of its stats will sharply increase when it's in a pinch.

Berry.Name: Enigma Berry
Berry.Effect: Restores holder's HP if hit by a supereffective move.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, being hit by a supereffective attack will restore its HP.

Berry.Name: Micle Berry
Berry.Effect: Raises the accuracy of one move when HP falls below 25%.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, its accuracy will increase just once when it’s in a pinch.

Berry.Name: Custap Berry
Berry.Effect: Causes the holder to go first once when HP falls below 25%.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it will be able to move first just once when it's in a pinch.

Berry.Name: Jaboca Berry
Berry.Effect: Damages a Pokémon that hits the holder with a physical move.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a physical attack hits the Pokémon holding it, the attacker will also be hurt.

Berry.Name: Rowap Berry
Berry.Effect: Damages a Pokémon that hits the holder with a special move.
Berry.Description: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a special attack hits the Pokémon holding it, the attacker will also be hurt.

Berry.Name: Roseli Berry
Berry.Effect: Decreases damage taken by the holder from a supereffective Fairy-type move.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Fairy-type attack.

Berry.Name: Kee Berry
Berry.Effect: Raises Defense if holder is hit by a physical move.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will increase the holder’s Defense if it’s hit with a physical move.

Berry.Name: Maranga Berry
Berry.Effect: Raises Special Defense if holder is hit by a special move.
Berry.Description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will increase the holder’s Sp. Def if it’s hit with a special move.
